reviews.content: I've been a patient for a couple of years, and I think they are great. Dr. Rodriguez is professional and thorough, and has a very warm personality. Dixie is very effective and has helped me through numerous insurance issues. Mayra is attentive and my vitals are always taken properly, and she gets my prescriptions sorted out; her time management skills are top notch. They take many different insurances, and they are Family Practice, so they take adult patients as well. I've never been handed off to a Nurse Practitioner here, as happens at other doctor's offices so often, so if I can be taken care of in the office they do not do unnecessary referrals.

The front office staff and the Office Manager are horrible. The office Manager is rude.  the also don't know what they are talking about and when you have a complaint they do not call you back.  I and removing all of my children form there and going to another Dr. Its sad because I like Dr Gonzalez and have been at that office for years since my last child was a baby and she is 12 now. He is not the problem it is his staff I'm not even sure he know how bad they are. If I could rate them a negative number I would because they are less than zero.

Let's just say I'm posting this while I'm on hold. My baby was given a vaccination without my authorization after I requested that that they not give it to her, see my Google review--I don't even feel like discussing it. I just wanted to post my negative review here as well. It is hard to find reviews on pediatricians, unfortunately. I will be trying a different pediatric office.
